result.eng: I'd say I had more to drink that he.
result.ga: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean
result.orig: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean
result.html: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigeseanI'd say I had more to drink that he.
result.ponchtml: Déarfainn go raiḃ níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a ḃí aigeseanI'd say I had more to drink that he.

result.eng: My father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.
result.ga: Tá Toyota ag m'athair ach tá Ford agamsa
result.orig: Tá Toyota ag m'athair ach tá Ford agamsa
result.html: Tá Toyota ag m'athair ach tá Ford agamsaMy father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.
result.ponchtml: Tá Toyota ag m'aṫair aċ tá Ford agamsaMy father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.

result.eng: I have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.
result.ga: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon Siubhán
result.orig: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon Siubhán
result.html: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Mícheál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon SiubhánI have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.
result.ponchtml: Tá beirt agamsa anseo Míċeál atá sa gcúinne ansin agus seo í m'iníon SiuḃánI have two [children] here, Mícheál who is in the corner there and here is my daughter Siubhán.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.html: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthiI've known her long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanaiṫne agamsa uirṫiI've known her long time.
